summary: REQ-173 and REQ-174 appear implemented via a new logged-out panel component that shows the existing logged-out message plus a prominent button labeled "Sign in with Internet Identity" that triggers the existing Internet Identity login flow. The diff also includes multiple unrelated feature additions/changes (e.g., AI Lottery route, admin behavior changes) that were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Add AI Lottery page/route and related UI/navigation updates
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested (BuildRequest is only about adding a visible Internet Identity sign-in button on the logged-out screen).
evidence: frontend/src/App.tsx (imports include AiLotteryPage; file summary mentions new /ai-lottery route)

hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested and potentially conflicts with the non-goal of not changing backend authentication logic/admin behavior.

hallucinated_features.description: Admin guard/caching/token-detection behavior changes (e.g., caching admin status, denied screen token detection)
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; BuildRequest explicitly scopes changes to the logged-out screen button and indicates no changes to admin allowlist behavior.
evidence: frontend/src/App.tsx (AdminGuard uses adminStatusCache; tokenDetected via getSecretParameter('caffeineAdminToken'))
frontend-file-summaries.txt (describes admin guard changes and cache usage)

hallucinated_features.description: Large set of unrelated UI/feature updates (USD estimate lines, transfer history enhancements, new troubleshooting components, theme/css expansions, additional queries)
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest (scope is limited to the mobile logged-out login button/label).
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (multiple entries: index.css theme/lottery classes, tailwind changes, many page/component behavior updates, new React Query hooks)
